Koushik Roy

Email: 96koushikroy[at]gmail.com

Web: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=JzhGYr8AAAAJ&hl=en

About Me

Hi all, I’m Koushik, a computer scientist from Bangladesh. I have been working in academic research for the past two years. I am currently working as a Research Assistant at the NSU-Apurba R&D Lab at North South University, working on Bangla OCR for a project by the Government of Bangladesh. Previously, I have worked at Gaze Pte. Ltd. as a Deep Learning Researcher working on Face Liveliness Detection for Biometric Authentication pipelines.

Apart from this, I have been a part of multiple industry-academia collaborations with companies like Headblocks Ltd. and Apurba Technologies Inc., where I worked on ML-based solutions that would ameliorate their pre-existing conditions.

Other than academics, I am an avid enthusiast for algorithmic problem solving, being a sport programmer during my undergraduate study, represented my university at multiple national and international competitions.

CV link here.

Education

North South University

BSc. in Computer Science & Engineering

2015 - 2019, Dhaka, Bangladesh

Graduated with a cumulative GPA of 3.53 out of 4.00 (cum-laude distinction).

Experience

Apurba-NSU R&D Lab, North South University

Research Assistant

January 2021 - Present, Dhaka, Bangladesh

Working at the Apurba-NSU R&D Lab, conducting research on Bangla OCR on a government-funded project primarily focused towards low-resource approaches, and developing NLP downstream tasks (NER, PoS Tagging, QA, etc.) using popular language models.

Gaze AI

Deep Learning Researcher

February 2020 - January 2021, Dhaka, Bangladesh

Worked on Vehicle Re-identification for the CVPR AICITY Challenge 2020, Knowledge Distillation for model optimization, and Face Recognition. Current research includes a Novel Face Spoof Detection (Gaze’s Flagship product) architecture which would leverage DL techniques and deploying PyTorch models with a C++ backend. My publications from this lab are available on the Publications section.

Interests & Skills

Interests

  • Metric Learning strategies for problems in Vision or NLP.
  • Convex approaches for model optimization.
  • Low Resource NLP Problems (e.g. Domain Adaptation, Cost Sensitive Learning).
  • Improvements for Face Anti-Spoofing using Neural approaches.

Technical Skills

  • Frameworks: PyTorch, AllenNLP, FastAI, NCNN, Flask, ReactJs, NodeJs
  • Languages: C++, Python, Javascript, SQL
